First Builder06423cd7tr035no4ewfgfcx2v33tyshxabm01534282014-07-17T06:49:48ZSon Of Fire24907634A tiny edit for a tiny page.The '''First Builder''' is a position in the [[Night's Watch]], the group responsible for defending [[the Wall]]. The holder is the leader of the builders, only answering to the [[Lord Commander]].

The current First Builder is [[Othell Yarwyck]].
